imdb.title: Love Live!: School Idol Project
imdb.plot: When news gets out that the school is going to close due to poor numbers of new students Honoka and several of her friends rally together and form a school Idol group in order to prevent the school from closing.

episodes.title: Love Live! School Idol Project OVA
episodes.plot: After hearing about a dream from Hanayo, Maki ends up absent from school the next day. As the others decide to go visit her, Eli returns to the school to pick up a textbook and follows a mysterious shadow, only to wind up back outside with the others, where it is suddenly nighttime. There, they are approached by a younger version of Maki.

episodes.title: Love Live Once Again!
episodes.plot: With a new school year approaching, Honoka succeeds Eli as student council president, with Umi and Kotori as her aides. Word soon reaches the gang that Love Live is taking place yet again on a larger scale then last year.

episodes.title: Yusho o Mezashite
episodes.plot: Once again, µ's pursues the Love Live tournament. A new rule is announced that only previously unperformed songs can be sung at regional preliminaries. The girls head to Maki's cabin in the mountains to write a new song.

episodes.title: Yume no Tobira
episodes.plot: The Love Live regional preliminaries are just ahead. The group is free to choose any location for their performance, so Honoka suggests they perform at school, but Nico and Hanayo insist they cannot win unless they choose a location with greater impact.

episodes.title: Uchu Nanba Wan Aidoru
episodes.plot: µ's makes it through regional preliminaries. The girls become extra motivated when rival group A-RISE has also made it through. Meanwhile, Nico begins to skip practice. The group follows her out of suspicion, and find she is grocery shopping.

episodes.title: Atarashi Watashi
episodes.plot: While Honoka, Kotori and Umi are away on a field trip, Rin is assigned as temporary leader of the group as they prepare for a fashion event at the weekend. However, Rin isn't confident in herself and struggles with the responsibilities.

episodes.title: Happi Harowin
episodes.plot: A-RISE and µ's are invited to appear in a Halloween event. The girls try new looks to improve their impact. However, Honoka decides they shouldn't change, as they have variety in members. Meanwhile, Yukiho finds something shocking in Honoka's room.

episodes.title: Nantoka Shinakya!
episodes.plot: A physical exam reveals Honoka and Hanayo have gained weight. Meanwhile, Umi and Kotori take over Honoka's student council duties as she goes on a diet and causes a budget blunder.

episodes.title: Watashi no Nozomi
episodes.plot: When µ's has trouble agreeing on a song for the final preliminaries, Nozomi suggests writing a love song. The members are shaken by the idea of performing an unfamiliar genre, but Eli is surprisingly supportive.

episodes.title: Kokoro no Merodi
episodes.plot: Honoka faces difficulties due to snowstorm, but with the help of the other friends, the "Muses" manage to arrive in time for the performance stage and perform for the preliminary finals.

episodes.title: Myuzu
episodes.plot: On their way to the local shrine to celebrate the new year, the girls run into A-Rise, who congratulate them on winning the Love Live preliminaries. Meanwhile, Nico, Eli and Nozomi worry about their impending graduation.

episodes.title: Watashi-tachi ga Kimeta Koto
episodes.plot: After discussing the future of the 3rd grade students, Honoka and the others announce the future of µ's following the conclusion of the Love Live tournament.

episodes.title: Last Live
episodes.plot: After a random draw, µ's is the last group to perform at Love Live. The girls have their final practice together and have a sleepover. The next day they arrive for Love Live for their final performance.

episodes.title: Come True! Everyone's Dream
episodes.plot: Graduation Day finally arrives at Otonokizaka. Honoka presents her commemorative speech, which turns out to be a special song for the third years.

episodes.title: Kanae! Watashitachi no yume
episodes.plot: Honoka feels sad about announcing the closure of Otonokizaka, and heads to UTX to watch A-RISE's performance, making Honoka feel determined to save her school.

episodes.title: Aidoru wo hajimeyô!
episodes.plot: Honoka manages to get permission to use the auditorium for a concert in a month's time, although Umi has doubts that they'll be ready in time. Unable to think of a name for their group, Honoka holds a contest for the name instead before realizing they do not actually have a song to practice.

episodes.title: Fâsuto raibu!
episodes.plot: Umi is nervous about performing in front of others so Honoka and Kotori try to build up her confidence by getting her to hand out fliers advertising their upcoming concert.

episodes.title: MakiRinPana
episodes.plot: µ's completes their first concert in an empty auditorium. In attempt to get a massive crowd for their next performance, Honoka tries to recruit Hanayo.

episodes.title: Niko shûrai
episodes.plot: µ's is now at 6 members with the addition of Hanayo, Rin, and Maki. The group attempts to make their idol group into a proper school club. However, they are informed another idol club exists, and must negotiate with them.

episodes.title: Sentâ wa dare da?
episodes.plot: After discussing the upcoming PV, Honoka decides they would not need a center even though Nico is a leader of the idol club.

episodes.title: Erîchika
episodes.plot: Hanayo informs the gang of a school idol tournament called Love Live in which the top 20 school idol groups from across the nation compete against each other. Needing the school's permission to enter, the group go to ask the chairwoman for permission, and despite Eli's objection, she approves of their entry on the condition that none of them fail a subject in the upcoming exams.

episodes.title: Yaritai koto wa
episodes.plot: The chairwoman clarifies the school will be closed down if their upcoming open day event is received negatively. As Eli tries to think of ways to attract potential students besides µ's, Umi suggests to the group that they should get Eli to teach them how to dance.

episodes.title: Wandâ zôn
episodes.plot: μ's grows to nine members with the addition of Eli and Nozomi. The group's School Idol ranking is rising to 50th, but they mus reach 20th place to participate in Love Live! They must take drastic measures to reach their goal.

episodes.title: Senpai kinshi!
episodes.plot: Honoka suggests the group stays overnight at Maki's summer home to practice. When the girls arrive they ignore their training and go play on the beach, instead.

episodes.title: Saikô no raibu
episodes.plot: It is a new semester and the group is ranked 19th, which is high enough to be considered for Love Live! µ's next event is at the school festival, but they are forced to perform on the roof.

episodes.title: Tomodachi
episodes.plot: After the incident occurred during his performance, µ's does not participate in Love Live making Honoka very sad. Kotori reveals that he will study in another country, and µ's is put on hiatus.

episodes.title: µ's Myûjikku sutâto!
episodes.plot: Honoka spends the day with her friends and discovers that A-RISE has won Love Live. Honoka tries to stop Kotori from boarding the plane and then, µ's perform in a crowded auditorium, returning to the rankings.
